00086     template<> 
00087     void MatchingEngine::getMatchesInternal(TREX::europa::details::InternalStateId const &inst, 
00088                                             std::vector<MatchingRuleId> &results) {
00089       trigger(inst->entityType(), m_rulesByObjectType, results);
00090     }
00091 
00092     template<> 
00093     void MatchingEngine::getMatches(TREX::europa::details::InternalStateId const &inst, 
00094                                     std::vector<MatchingRuleId> &results) {
00095       debugMsg("trex:always", "Attempt to match InternalState ("<<inst->getTime()<<", "<<inst->getTimeline()<<")"); 
00096       m_cycleCount++;
00097       results = m_unfilteredRules;
00098       getMatchesInternal(inst, results);
00099     }
00100

00102   }

00107   class UpdateMatchFinder :public EUROPA::SOLVERS::MatchFinder {
00108   public:
00109     void getMatches(EUROPA::SOLVERS::MatchingEngineId const &engine, 
00110                     EUROPA::EntityId const &entity,
00111                     std::vector<EUROPA::SOLVERS::MatchingRuleId> &results) {
00112       engine->getMatches(TREX::europa::details::InternalStateId(entity), results);
00113     }
00114   }; 
00115   
00116   class DefaultSchema :public SchemaPlugin {
00117   public:
00118     
00119     void registerComponents(Assembly const &assembly) {
00120       // declare the filter used for maintaining reactor look-ahead
00121       TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, TREX::europa::DeliberationFilter,
00122                                 TREX_DELIB_FILT);
00123       
00124       // declare the components used during synchronization
00125       TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, TREX::europa::SynchronizationFilter,
00126                                 TREX_SYNCH_FILT);
00127       TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(assembly, TREX::europa::SynchronizationManager, 
00128                                  TREX_SYNCH_MGR);
00129       TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(assembly, TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint, 
00130                                  TREX_SYNCH_HANDLER);
00131       
00132       // declare few TREX utility constraints
00133       TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, TREX::europa::CheckExternal, isExternal, trex);
00134       TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, TREX::europa::CheckInternal, isInternal, trex);
00135       TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, TREX::europa::Bind, bind, trex);      
00136 
00137       TREX_REGISTER_MATCH_FINDER(assembly, UpdateMatchFinder, 
00138                                  TREX::europa::details::InternalState::entityTypeName());    
00139     }
00140     
00141   }; // ::DefaultSchema

00164   class TokenActivator {
00165   public:
00174     TokenActivator(EUROPA::TokenId const &token):m_token(token), m_active(token->getActiveToken()) {
00175       if( m_active.isId() ) 
00176         m_token->cancel();
00177     }
00183     ~TokenActivator() {
00184       if( m_active.isId() )
00185         m_token->merge(m_active);
00186     }
00194     EUROPA::TokenId active() {
00195       if( m_active.isId() )
00196         return m_active;
00197       else 
00198         return m_token;
00199     }
00200     
00201     EUROPA::Token *operator->() const {
00202       return m_token.operator->();
00203     }
00204     EUROPA::Token &operator* () const {
00205       return *operator->();
00206     }
00207     
00208   private:
00209     EUROPA::TokenId m_token, m_active;
00210     
00211   }; // ::TokenActivator
00212   
00213   DefaultSchema trex_schema;
00214 } // ::

00216 Assembly &TREX::europa::details::assembly(EUROPA::EngineComponentId const &component) {
00217   EUROPA::EngineId engine = component->getEngine();
00218   
00219   if( !EUROPA::Id<Assembly>::convertable(engine) )
00220     throw EuropaException("component's engine is not a TREX assembly"); 
00221   return *(EUROPA::Id<Assembly>(engine));
00222 }

00241 // structors
00242 
00243 TREX::europa::details::InternalState::InternalState(EUROPA::TimelineId const &timeline, Assembly &assembly, bool post)
00244 :EUROPA::Entity(), m_timeline(timeline), m_assembly(assembly), m_id(this), m_post(post) {
00245   assembly.predicates(timeline, m_pred_names);
00246 
00247   // Remove the special values .... they will be handled otherwise
00248   m_pred_names.erase(Assembly::FAILED_PRED);
00249   m_pred_names.erase(Assembly::UNDEFINED_PRED);
00250   std::cout<<"Predicates for "<<timeline->toString()<<":\n";
00251   for(std::set<EUROPA::LabelStr>::const_iterator i=m_pred_names.begin(); m_pred_names.end()!=i; ++i) 
00252     std::cout<<"\t- "<<Assembly::predicate_name(timeline, i->toString())<<"\n"; 
00253   
00254   
00255 }

00257 // observers 
00258 
00259 EUROPA::eint TREX::europa::details::InternalState::getTime() const {
00260   return m_assembly.now();
00261 }
00262 
00263 std::pair<TREX::europa::details::InternalState::sequence::const_iterator, 
00264 TREX::europa::details::InternalState::sequence::const_iterator> 
00265 TREX::europa::details::InternalState::getActiveCandidates() const {
00266   sequence const &tokens = m_timeline->getTokenSequence();
00267   sequence::const_iterator i=tokens.begin(), j;
00268   
00269   if( m_last.isId() ) {
00270     EUROPA::TokenId active = m_last;
00271     if( m_last->isMerged() )
00272       active = m_last->getActiveToken();
00273     
00274     // Locate the corresponding active token
00275     for(; tokens.end()!=i && active!=*i; ++i);
00276     
00277     if( tokens.end()!=i )
00278       ++i;
00279     j=i;
00280     if( tokens.end()!=j )
00281       ++j;
00282   } else { 
00283     // Locate the corresponding active token
00284     for(; tokens.end()!=i && (*i)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=getTime(); ++i);
00285     
00286     for(j=i; tokens.end()!=j && (*j)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=getTime(); ++j); 
00287   }
00288   return std::make_pair(i, j);
00289 }
00290   
00291 // manipulators 
00292 
00293 EUROPA::TokenId TREX::europa::details::InternalState::newToken(EUROPA::DbClientId const &cli, 
00294                                                                std::string const &pred, bool insert) {
00295   m_prev = m_last;
00296   m_last = cli->createToken(pred.c_str(), NULL, false, true);
00297 
00298   m_last->start()->specify(getTime());
00299   m_last->end()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getTime()+1,
00300                                                               std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()));
00301   m_last->getObject()->specify(m_timeline->getKey());
00302   
00303   if( insert ) {
00304     if( m_prev.isId() ) 
00305       cli->constrain(m_timeline, m_prev, m_last);
00306     else
00307       cli->constrain(m_timeline, m_last, m_last);
00308   }
00309 
00310   return m_last;
00311 }
00312 
00313 EUROPA::TokenId TREX::europa::details::InternalState::newToken(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00314   m_prev = m_last;
00315   m_last = tok;
00316   return m_last;
00317 }
00318 
00319 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::push_end(EUROPA::DbClientId const &cli) {
00320   std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> lt_scope(2);
00321   
00322   lt_scope[0] = m_assembly.clock();
00323   lt_scope[1] = m_last->end();
00324   m_cstr = cli->createConstraint("lt", lt_scope, "Inertial Value");
00325 }
00326 
00327 
00328 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::release_end(EUROPA::DbClientId const &cli) {
00329   cli->deleteConstraint(m_cstr);
00330   m_cstr = EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::noId();
00331 }
00332 
00333 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::removeToken() {
00334   m_last->discard();
00335   m_last = m_prev;
00336   m_prev = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00337 }
00338 
00339 
00340 
00341 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::commit() {
00342   if( m_prev.isId() ) {
00343     TokenActivator pred(m_prev);
00344     
00345     pred->end()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getTime()));
00346     pred->duration()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getTime()-pred->start()->getSpecifiedValue()));
00347     m_prev = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00348     if( m_post )
00349       m_assembly.notify(m_timeline, m_last);
00350   } else {
00351     if( m_last->start()->getSpecifiedValue()==getTime() ) {
00352       if( m_post ) 
00353         m_assembly.notify(m_timeline, m_last);
00354     } else {
00355       TokenActivator cur(m_last);
00356       EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(getTime()+1, 
00357                                        std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()),
00358         dur(getTime()+1-cur->start()->getSpecifiedValue(),
00359             std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity());
00360       cur->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00361       cur->duration()->restrictBaseDomain(dur);
00362     }
00363     
00364     if( m_cstr.isId() ) {
00365       m_assembly.plan_db()->getClient()->deleteConstraint(m_cstr);
00366       m_cstr = EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::noId();
00367     }
00368   }
00369 }

00412 // structors 
00413 
00414 Assembly::Assembly(EuropaReactor &owner)
00415 :m_state(INACTIVE), m_synch(false), m_reactor(owner) {
00416   m_trex_schema->setStream(m_debug, name().str()+".europa.log");
00417   
00418   // create europa modules for our reactor 
00419   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleConstraintEngine())->getId());
00420   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleConstraintLibrary())->getId());
00421   addModule((new EUROPA::ModulePlanDatabase())->getId());
00422   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleRulesEngine())->getId());
00423   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleTemporalNetwork())->getId());
00424   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleSolvers())->getId());
00425   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleNddl())->getId());
00426   
00427   doStart(); // complete mother class initialization
00428   
00429   //Create entry points to the europa components
00430   m_europa_schema = dynamic_cast<EUROPA::Schema *>(getComponent("Schema"))->getId();
00431   m_cstr_engine = dynamic_cast<EUROPA::ConstraintEngine *>(getComponent("ConstraintEngine"))->getId();
00432   m_plan_db = dynamic_cast<EUROPA::PlanDatabase *>(getComponent("PlanDatabase"))->getId();
00433   m_rules_engine = dynamic_cast<EUROPA::RulesEngine *>(getComponent("RulesEngine"))->getId();
00434   
00435   // create the trex specific constraints propagator
00436   new ReactorPropagator(*this, "trex", m_cstr_engine);
00437   m_cstr_engine->setAutoPropagation(false);
00438   
00439   // Inject trex extensions 
00440   m_trex_schema->registerComponents(*this);
00441   
00442   EUROPA::DomainComparator::setComparator((EUROPA::Schema *)m_europa_schema);
00443 }
00444 
00445 Assembly::~Assembly() {
00446   if( m_synchronization_solver.isId() ) {
00447     m_synchronization_solver.release();
00448     m_deliberation_solver.release();
00449   }
00450     
00451   doShutdown();
00452 }

00465 bool Assembly::isAgentTimeline(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00466   return m_europa_schema->isA(obj->getType(), TREX_TIMELINE);
00467 }
00468 
00469 bool Assembly::isAgentTimeline(EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type) const {
00470   return m_europa_schema->isA(type->getName(), TREX_TIMELINE);  
00471 }
00472 
00473 bool Assembly::isExternal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00474   return isAgentTimeline(obj) && m_reactor.isExternal(obj->getName().toString());
00475 }
00476 
00477 bool Assembly::isInternal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00478   return isAgentTimeline(obj) && m_reactor.isInternal(obj->getName().toString());  
00479 }

00481 void Assembly::predicates(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, 
00482                           std::set<EUROPA::LabelStr> &result) const {
00483   m_europa_schema->getPredicates(obj->getObjectType(), result);
00484 }

00486 
00487 EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId Assembly::attribute(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj,
00488                                                   std::string const &name) const {
00489   std::string full_name(obj->getName().toString()+"."+name);
00490   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var(obj->getVariable(full_name));
00491   
00492   if( var.isNoId() )
00493     throw EuropaException("Variable "+full_name+" does not exists.");
00494   return var;
00495 }
00496 
00497 EUROPA::LabelStr Assembly::default_pred(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00498   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId default_var = default_attr(obj);
00499   if( !default_var->isSpecified() ) 
00500     throw EuropaException("Agent timeline "+obj->getName().toString()+
00501                           " does not specify its default predicate");
00502   EUROPA::DataTypeId type = default_var->getDataType();
00503   return default_var->getDataType()->toString(default_var->getSpecifiedValue());
00504 }
00505 
00506 
00507 void Assembly::check_default(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00508   std::string short_pred = default_pred(obj).toString();
00509   
00510   if( !m_europa_schema->isPredicate(predicate_name(obj, short_pred)) )
00511     throw EuropaException("Agent timeline "+obj->getName().toString()+
00512                           "'s default predciate \""+short_pred+"\" does not exists.");
00513 }
00514 
00515 bool Assembly::isIgnored(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00516   EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom = tok->getObject()->lastDomain();
00517   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs = dom.makeObjectList();
00518   
00519   for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator o=objs.begin();
00520       objs.end()!=o; ++o)
00521     if( !isIgnored(*o) )
00522       return false;
00523   return !objs.empty();
00524 }

00548 
00549 void Assembly::ignore(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00550   m_ignored_objects.insert(obj);
00551 }
00552 
00553 void Assembly::internal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00554   EUROPA::TimelineId tl(obj);
00555   
00556   if( m_internals.end()==m_internals.find(tl) ) {
00557     m_internals.insert((new details::InternalState(tl, *this))->getId());
00558   }
00559 }
00560 
00561 bool Assembly::synchronize() {
00562   EUROPA::eint cur = now();
00563   
00564   debugMsg("trex:always", "============================ START SYNCH["<<cur<<"] ===========================");
00565   m_synch = true;
00566   BOOST_SCOPE_EXIT((&m_synch)(&cur)(&m_plan_db)) { // scope exit to ensure that m_synch 
00567                                  // will be set back to false no matter what
00568     debugMsg("trex:always", "============================ END SYNCH["<<cur<<"] ===========================");
00569     debugMsg("trex:always", "Plan after synchronization:\n"
00570              <<EUROPA::PlanDatabaseWriter::toString(m_plan_db));
00571     m_synch = false;
00572   } BOOST_SCOPE_EXIT_END
00573   // First I update the external observations
00574   for( obs_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin(); m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00575     (*i)->commit();
00576   debugMsg("trex:always", "Plan before synchronization:\n"
00577            <<EUROPA::PlanDatabaseWriter::toString(m_plan_db));
00578       
00579   if( m_synchronization_solver->solve() ) {
00580     // clear the decision stack 
00581     m_synchronization_solver->clear();
00582     for(obs_map::iterator i = m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00583       (*i)->commit();
00584     m_state = ACTIVE;
00585     return true;
00586   } else {
00587     if( m_deliberation_solver->getDepth()>0 ) {
00588       m_deliberation_solver->reset();
00589       if( m_synchronization_solver->solve() ) {
00590         // clear the decision stack 
00591         m_synchronization_solver->clear();
00592         for(obs_map::iterator i = m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00593           (*i)->commit();
00594         m_state = ACTIVE;
00595         return true;
00596       }
00597     }
00598     mark_invalid();
00599     // nothing here yet but it will come  ...
00600     return false;
00601   }
00602 }
00603 
00604 bool Assembly::resume() {
00605   if( invalid() ) {
00606     log("ERROR")<<"Cannot resolve synchronization with an invalid database";
00607   } else if( m_deliberation_solver->isExhausted() ) {
00608     log("WARN")<<"No plan found.";
00609     mark_invalid();
00610   } else {
00611     if( inactive() ) {
00612       m_state = ACTIVE;
00613     }
00614     m_deliberation_solver->step();
00615     if( m_deliberation_solver->noMoreFlaws() ) {
00616       m_state = INACTIVE;
00617     }
00618     debugMsg("trex:always", "Plan after step:\n"
00619              <<EUROPA::PlanDatabaseWriter::toString(m_plan_db))
00620     return true;
00621   }
00622   return false;
00623 }
00624 
00625 void Assembly::notify(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl, 
00626                       EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00627   Observation obs(tl->getName().c_str(), 
00628                   tok->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().c_str());
00629   TokenActivator my_tok(tok);
00630   
00631   std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &attr = my_tok.active()->parameters();
00632 
00633   for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator a=attr.begin();
00634       attr.end()!=a; ++a) {
00635     EUROPA::LabelStr name = (*a)->getName();
00636     EUROPA::Domain const &dom = (*a)->lastDomain();
00637     std::auto_ptr<TREX::transaction::DomainBase> trex_dom(details::trex_domain(dom));
00638     
00639     my_tok->getVariable(name)->restrictBaseDomain(dom);
00640     obs.restrictAttribute(name.toString(), *trex_dom);
00641   }
00642   m_reactor.postObservation(obs);
00643 }
00644 
00645 
00646 
00647 // modifiers 
00648 
00649 void Assembly::update_horizon(EUROPA::eint cur) {
00650   EUROPA::eint look_ahead = m_reactor.getExecLatency()+m_reactor.getLookAhead(),
00651     end_date = m_reactor.getFinalTick();
00652   
00653   m_horizon = EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(cur, std::min(cur+look_ahead, end_date)); 
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 bool Assembly::playTransaction(std::string const &nddl) {
00658   bool found;
00659   std::string config_file = m_reactor.manager().use("NDDL.cfg", found);
00660   
00661   if( !found ) 
00662     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to locate NDDL.cfg.");
00663   
00664   boost::property_tree::ptree cfg;
00665   read_xml(config_file, cfg, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00666   
00667   if( cfg.empty() ) 
00668     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, 
00669                            config_file+" nddl configuration appears to be empty.");
00670   if( cfg.size()!=1 )
00671     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, 
00672                            config_file+" nddl configuration appears to have multiple XML roots.");
00673   // extract all the <include /> from nddl config
00674   boost::property_tree::ptree::const_assoc_iterator i, last;
00675   boost::tie(i, last) = cfg.front().second.equal_range("include");
00676   
00677   for(; last!=i; ++i) {
00678     std::string path = parse_attr<std::string>(*i, "path");
00679     boost::replace_all(path, ";", ":");
00680     getLanguageInterpreter("nddl")->getEngine()->getConfig()->setProperty("nddl.includePath", path);
00681   }
00682   
00683   // Inject TREX_PATH
00684   std::ostringstream trex_path;
00685   trex_path<<'.';
00686   std::copy(m_reactor.manager().begin(), m_reactor.manager().end(),
00687             std::ostream_iterator<std::string>(trex_path, ":"));
00688   getLanguageInterpreter("nddl")->getEngine()->getConfig()->setProperty("nddl.includePath", trex_path.str());
00689   
00690   std::string ret;
00691   
00692   // Parse the nddl model 
00693   try {
00694     ret = executeScript("nddl", nddl, true);
00695   } catch(EUROPA::PSLanguageExceptionList const &le) {
00696     std::ostringstream msg;
00697     msg<<"Error while parsing "<<nddl<<":\n"<<le;
00698     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, msg.str());
00699   } catch(Error const &ee) {
00700     std::ostringstream msg;
00701     msg<<"Error while parsing "<<nddl<<":\n"<<ee.getMsg();
00702     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, msg.str());    
00703   }
00704   
00705   if( !ret.empty() ) 
00706     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Error while parsing "+nddl+":\n"+ret);
00707  
00708   return m_cstr_engine->constraintConsistent();
00709 }
00710 
00711 void Assembly::configure_solver(std::string const &cfg) {
00712   if( m_synchronization_solver.isNoId() ) {
00713     // Locate the solver configuration
00714     bool found;
00715     std::string file = m_reactor.manager().use(cfg, found);
00716     
00717     if( !found )
00718       throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to locate solver config file \""+cfg+"\"");
00719 
00720     std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::TiXmlElement> xml_cfg(EUROPA::initXml(file.c_str()));
00721     
00722     EUROPA::TiXmlElement *filter = dynamic_cast<EUROPA::TiXmlElement *>(xml_cfg->InsertBeforeChild(xml_cfg->FirstChild(), 
00723                                                                                                    EUROPA::TiXmlElement("FlawFilter")));
00724     
00725 
00726     // Set up the deliberation solver 
00727     filter->SetAttribute("component", to_string_eval(TREX_DELIB_FILT));
00728     m_deliberation_solver = (new EUROPA::SOLVERS::Solver(plan_db(), *xml_cfg))->getId();
00729 
00730     // Set up the synchronization solver 
00731     filter->SetAttribute("component", to_string_eval(TREX_SYNCH_FILT));
00732   
00733     // Inject the synchronization handler
00734     EUROPA::TiXmlElement synch(to_string_eval(TREX_SYNCH_MGR)),
00735       handler("FlawHandler");
00736     
00737     handler.SetAttribute("component", to_string_eval(TREX_SYNCH_HANDLER));
00738 
00739     synch.InsertEndChild(handler);
00740     
00741     xml_cfg->InsertEndChild(synch);
00742     
00743     m_synchronization_solver = (new EUROPA::SOLVERS::Solver(plan_db(), *xml_cfg))->getId();
00744 
00745   } else {
00746     log("WARN")<<"Attempted to configure the solver more than once."; 
00747   }
00748 }
00749 
00750 void Assembly::update_clock(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &dom, bool init) {
00751   if( init && m_clock.isNoId() ) {
00752     m_clock = plan_db()->getGlobalVariable(CLOCK_VAR);
00753     if( m_clock.isNoId() ) {
00754       debugMsg("trex:always", "Unable to find clock variable \""<<CLOCK_VAR.toString()<<"\".");
00755       log("WARN")<<"The current model does not specify the clock variable \""
00756                  <<CLOCK_VAR.toString()<<'\"'; 
00757       m_clock = plan_db()->getClient()->createVariable(dom.getTypeName().c_str(), dom, CLOCK_VAR.c_str());
00758     }
00759   }
00760   if( m_clock.isId() )
00761     m_clock->restrictBaseDomain(dom);
00762 }
00763 
00764 
00765 void Assembly::setFinalTick(TICK value) {
00766   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId end = plan_db()->getGlobalVariable(MISSION_END);
00767   
00768   if( end.isNoId() )
00769     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, 
00770                            "Unable to locate variable "+MISSION_END.toString()+" in reactor model.");
00771   end->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(value));
00772   update_clock(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::minus_infinity(),
00773                                          EUROPA::eint(value)), true);
00774 }
00775 
00776 void Assembly::setTickFactor(double delta) {
00777   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId tick = plan_db()->getGlobalVariable(TICK_DURATION);
00778   if( tick.isNoId() )
00779     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to locate variable "+TICK_DURATION.toString()+" in reactor model.");
00780   tick->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalDomain(delta));
00781 }
00782 
00783 std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> Assembly::convert(Predicate const &pred, bool fact) {
00784   EUROPA::DbClientId client = plan_db()->getClient();
00785   EUROPA::TokenId token = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00786   bool rejectable = !fact;
00787   EUROPA::ObjectId object = client->getObject(pred.object().str().c_str());
00788   std::string pred_name = predicate_name(object, pred.predicate().str());
00789   
00790   if( m_europa_schema->isPredicate(pred_name) ) {
00791     token = client->createToken(pred_name.c_str(), NULL, rejectable, fact);
00792     
00793     if( token.isId() ) {
00794       for(Predicate::const_iterator a=pred.begin(); pred.end()!=a; ++a) {
00795         EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId attr = token->getVariable(a->first.str());
00796         
00797         if( attr.isId() ) {
00798           try {
00799             details::europa_restrict(attr, a->second.domain());
00800           } catch(DomainExcept const &err) {
00801             log("WARN")<<"Failed to restrict attribute "<<a->first<<" on token "
00802                        <<pred.object()<<'.'<<pred.predicate()<<": "<<err;
00803           }
00804         } else 
00805           log("WARN")<<"Ignoring unknown attribute "<<a->first<<" on token "<<pred.object()
00806                      <<'.'<<pred.predicate();
00807       }
00808     } else 
00809       throw EuropaException("Failed to create new token "+pred_name+": unknown Europa error");
00810   } else {
00811     log("WARN")<<"Unknown predicate "<<pred.object()<<'.'<<pred.predicate();
00812     
00813     if( fact ) {
00814       pred_name = predicate_name(object, UNDEFINED_PRED.toString());
00815       if( m_europa_schema->isPredicate(pred_name) ) {
00816         token = client->createToken(pred_name.c_str(), NULL, rejectable, fact);
00817         if( token.isNoId() )
00818           throw EuropaException("Failed to create new token "+pred_name+": unknown Europa error");
00819       } else 
00820         throw EuropaException("Unable to create special predicate \""+UNDEFINED_PRED.toString()+
00821                               "\" for object "+pred.object().str());
00822     }
00823   }
00824   if( token.isId() ) {
00825     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId tok_obj = token->getObject();
00826     tok_obj->specify(object->getKey());
00827     if( fact ) {
00828       obs_map::iterator i=m_externals.find(EUROPA::TimelineId(object));
00829       if( m_externals.end()==i ) {
00830         i = m_externals.insert((new details::InternalState(object, *this, false))->getId()).first;
00831       }
00832       (*i)->newToken(token);
00833     }
00834   }
00835   return std::make_pair(object, token);
00836 }
00837 
00838 void Assembly::recall(EUROPA::TokenId const &goal) {
00839   debugMsg("trex:recall", goal->toString()<<" recalled.")
00840   
00841   if( !goal->isInactive() ) {
00842     // Not inactive => a decision should involve this token
00843     // Locate the firs reference to this goal in the stack
00844     EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionStack const &decisions = m_deliberation_solver->getDecisionStack();
00845     
00846     for(size_t i=0; i<decisions.size(); ++i) {
00847       if( decisions[i]->getFlawedEntityKey()==goal->getKey() ) {
00848         debugMsg("trex:recall", "backtracking "<<(decisions.size()-i)<<" steps.");
00849         m_deliberation_solver->reset(decisions.size()-i); // reset all the decisions up to this point
00850         debugMsg("trex:recall", "New decision stack : "<<m_deliberation_solver->getDecisionStackAsString());
00851         break;
00852       }
00853     }
00854   }
00855   goal->discard();
00856 }
